channel.title: N S Rawat - Data Science & Machine Learning Portfolio
channel.description: Data Scientist specializing in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Statistical Analysis, and Data Visualization. Transforming complex data into actionable insights using Python, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, and modern analytics tools. Passionate about predictive modeling, business intelligence, and creating data-driven solutions.

item.title: Introduction to Machine Learning Algorithms
item.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding the most popular machine learning algorithms, their use cases, and when to apply them in your data science projects.
item.author: digital@nsrawat.in (N S Rawat)

item.title: Complete Machine Learning Workflow: From Data to Deployment
item.description: A comprehensive guide to the entire machine learning workflow, covering data preparation, model training, evaluation, and deployment.
item.author: digital@nsrawat.in (N S Rawat)
